_configuration_notes.filesystem: Provides secure file operations with configurable access controls
_configuration_notes.sequential-thinking: Dynamic and reflective problem-solving through thought sequences
_configuration_notes.everything: Reference/test server with prompts, resources, and tools
_configuration_notes.git: Tools to read, search, and manipulate Git repositories
_configuration_notes.fetch: Web content fetching and conversion for efficient LLM usage
_configuration_notes.github: Repository management, file operations, and GitHub API integration - requires GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN
_configuration_notes.google-drive: File access and search capabilities for Google Drive - requires GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
_configuration_notes.google-maps: Location services, directions, and place details - requires GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
_configuration_notes.postgres: Read-only database access with schema inspection - requires DATABASE_URL
_configuration_notes.redis: Interact with Redis key-value stores - requires REDIS_URL
_configuration_notes.sqlite: Database interaction and business intelligence capabilities - requires DATABASE_PATH

_setup_instructions.github: Set GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN environment variable with your GitHub token
_setup_instructions.google-drive: Set GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS to path of your Google service account JSON file
_setup_instructions.google-maps: Set GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY environment variable with your Google Maps API key
_setup_instructions.postgres: Set DATABASE_URL environment variable with your PostgreSQL connection string
_setup_instructions.redis: Set REDIS_URL environment variable with your Redis connection string (default: redis://localhost:6379)
_setup_instructions.sqlite: Set DATABASE_PATH environment variable with path to your SQLite database file
